rooms.description: Large entrance area with reception and foyer; designed for social interaction.
Open space with seating arrangement; includes a view to the garden, following Vastu for positive energy.
Adjacent to living room; designed for family gatherings and dining activities.
Functional kitchen with an adjoining pantry and washing area; designed with efficient workflow in mind.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, following Vastu for relaxation.
Two adjoining bedrooms designed to optimize space; each room can be individually partitioned.
Quiet study and reading area with built-in bookshelves; located away from noisy zones as per Vastu principles.
Functional guest bedroom with attached bathroom.
En-suite to master bedroom; designed for privacy and comfort.
Small guest restroom near the entrance area; designed with minimal fixtures.
Centralized storage solution for household items and seasonal attire.
